he Mausoleum was a tomb in Loudwater in the Delimbiyr Vale in the midâ€“14 century DR.
It stood in an older part of Loudwater, on the bank of the Delimbiyr River and reached via a U-shaped passage with arches at its entrances, not far from Enalins Shop of Adventurers Supplies.
A dusty and long-abandoned space, it was home to skeletal fighters, zombies, ghouls, wights, and wraiths.
In autumn in the , undead emerged from the Mausoleum at nights and plagued the surrounding streets until adventurers, possibly the returning Heroes of Ascore, eliminated them. The thankful citizens returned to the area and gifted the heroes with a cloak of protection +2.
